paragraph.heading: 1 Assertions Property Page
paragraph.paragraph:
The Assertions property page allows you to choose which of the Design By Contract assertions to apply globally to your project. It is possible to override theses default assertions at the individual cluster level on the
ClustersPage.xml Clusters Property Page . To learn more about Design By Contract please refer to the
general/guided_tour/language/invitation-07.xml Invitation To Eiffel getting started help.
paragraph.heading: 2 Assertions
3 Evaluate Preconditions
paragraph.paragraph: Setting this property to true will perform runtime precondition assertion verification.
paragraph.heading: 3Evaluate Postconditions
paragraph.paragraph: Setting this property to true will perform runtime postcondition assertion verification.
paragraph.heading: 3Evaluate Check
paragraph.paragraph:
Setting this property to true will perform runtime check assertion verification in check blocks.
3Evaluate Loop Variant
Setting this property to true will perform runtime loop variant assertion verification on all loops.
3Evaluate Invariant
Setting this property to true will perform runtime invariant assertion verification on all classes.
